To prepare your return:

2. Don't forget to include any accessories that came with your product.
3. Remove any existing protective cover or film.
4. Package your product and its accessories according to the tips below.

To package your product:
• The box should be sturdy and stable, with your product lying flat so it won't move during transport.
• Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside for identification in case the original label is lost or damaged).
• Take photos of the package from the inside and outside before sending it. This will protect you in case your product is damaged during transport.

Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll notify you when it arrives at our location.

Best regards,
